bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, Freeride HT/Dirt Jumping/Street MTB design, Centerfold TT, butted and manipulated DT, forged and relieved HT, forged BB shell with integrated ISCG tabs, forged horizontal dropouts, integrated derailleur hanger, disc only, asymmetrical 6mm offset rear triangle.
